pr_title: DHFPROD-5386: Explorer Zero state: Default dropdown should be populated

timeline.bodyText:
Is there a better way to test this, probably RTL unit test than asserting in a before Each block.
An e2e test may not worry about default option being selected always and if beforeEach fails Cypress doesnt run any tests.
timeline.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText:
You can probably enhance existing test to verify default value:
expect(getByTestId('entity-select')).toBeInTheDocument();
replies.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: will verify on unit test level.
replies.author: timur-isangulov
